data.message: I went to Costa Rica last month for vacation. Now that I'm back in the US, my account has everything based as though I'm in Costa Rica.  I changed my region to default,  signed off all active sessions from that trip,  changed my password, but adds are for Costa Rica,  I can't use marketplace, events default to San Jose, shops search results are for central America.  How can I fix this? Thank

replies.message: Hey Antonio. You may need to update your location settings. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2yN6T18. -Elizabeth
Thank you for the quick response,  location is on, both in the app and in the phone. Without it, it defaults to Costa Rica.
Hi Antonio .Can you please help promote my Facebook page
